thread.title: BRIEF-Construction Partners Files For IPO Of Up To $207 Mln

title: BRIEF-Construction Partners Files For IPO Of Up To $207 Mln
text:
April 6, 2018 / 7:47 PM / in 31 minutes BRIEF-Construction Partners Files For IPO Of Up To $207 Mln Reuters Staff 
April 6 (Reuters) - Construction Partners Inc: 
* CONSTRUCTION PARTNERS INC FILES FOR IPO OF UP TO $207 MLN - SEC FILING 
* CONSTRUCTION PARTNERS SAYS INTENDS TO LIST ITS CLASS A COMMON STOCK ON NASDAQ STOCK MARKET LLC UNDER THE SYMBOL “ROAD” 
* CONSTRUCTION PARTNERS SAYS BAIRD, RAYMOND JAMES, STEPHENS INC ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO 
* CONSTRUCTION PARTNERS SAYS IMPERIAL CAPITAL AND D.A. DAVIDSON & CO ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO 
* CONSTRUCTION PARTNERS SAYS PROPOSED IPO PRICE IS AN ESTIMATE SOLELY FOR CALCULATING SEC REGISTRATION FEE Source text: ( bit.ly/2HjUyU9 )
